# pop()

**Instance Method**

Sends a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/pop()-swift.type.method] message to the receiver’s class.

## Declaration

```swift
func pop()
```

## Controlling which cursor is current

- **pop()**: Pops the current cursor off the top of the stack.
- **push()**: Puts the receiver on top of the cursor stack and makes it the current cursor.
- **set()**: Makes the receiver the current cursor.
